title: Large Decorative Oval with WPAT in Center with Musicians in Corners
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite and collaged paper
description: Original artwork for radio station WPAT Carcard project. On a black ground, colorful musicians in each corner surround a collaged medalion with the letters WPAT in elaborate lettering.
